text: @MPSHackney @RalfLittle Well done @BorisJohnson for your mixed messaging under fire at PMQs. Far from the first time your opining has had avoidable bad consequences. Go easy on him next time #kierstarmer. He likes the job title but not the diligence that the job requires. #coronavirus #lockdownuk
